segments.text: Jenny , you look terrible . What's eating you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hey , Chillon , I'm just trying to help .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry , Sally , it's not your fault .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I drew a blank on ~ about the test .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No kidding ! Didn't you study for it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , but nothing was clear during the test .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's too bad , anyway , I'm sure things will turn around next master .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm dead serious about this , Sally .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Come on , let's talk about it .
segments.speaker: S1
